attributes.additional_details:
To get the Transport Department to review the need for a New By- Pass in relation Bridgwater Somerset. Caused by the Construction of a New Nuclear Power Station, with the effect that the excess additional traffic will create on our Towns, viability to avoid standstill traffic.
Construction of Hinkley C, will take 10-12 years to complete, 2500 workers daily commuting to site, up wards of 800 HGV movements daily.
Please Support this Petition
